pingball.physics

Class SquareBumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.physics.Gadget
      • pingball.physics.SquareBumper

  • public class SquareBumper
extends Gadget
    SquareBumper is a type of Gadget that can exist in Pingball. A SquareBumper is exactly an L x L sized, filled square that a ball can bounce off of. Because a SquareBumper is a bumper type Gadget, there is no action directly associated with it.
    Author:
    Erik Nguyen

    • Constructor Detail

      • SquareBumper

        public SquareBumper(Board board,
            java.lang.String name,
            int x,
            int y)
        Creates a square shaped bumper with the given parameters and with a reflection coefficient of 1.0
        Parameters:
        board - the board that this bumper is in
        name - the name of the bumper
        x - the x coordinate of the upper left corner of this bumper, 0 <= x < 20
        y - the y coordinate of the upper left corner of this bumper, 0 <= y < 20

      • trigger

        public void trigger(Ball ball)
        Description copied from class: Gadget
        Trigger this Gadget and all other Gadget objects connected to this instance. This effectively begins whatever action sequences are associated with triggering a Gadget. All Gadget objects can be triggered by a ball.
        Overrides:
        trigger in class Gadget
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball that hit and triggered this Gadget

      • putInDisplay

        public void putInDisplay(char[][] board,
                int hOffset,
                int vOffset)
        Description copied from class: Gadget
        Puts the gadget into the provided board in text format. The given board may have buffers on the outer edges such that the true origin of the board maybe offset towards the inside
        Specified by:
        putInDisplay in class Gadget
        Parameters:
        board - the board to have text put in
        hOffset - the horizontal offset of the board's origin
        vOffset - the vertical offset of the board's origin
